cluster_relations.rel_desc: The authenticity of urban legends determines or reflects the truth behind the stories.
cluster_relations.canonical_rel_desc: Indicates that the subject affects, shapes, or constrains the nature, degree, or assessment of the object.

cluster_relations.rel_desc: Real events can support or underpin the authenticity of some urban legends.
cluster_relations.canonical_rel_desc: Indicates that the subject serves as factual or evidential support for the credibility or authenticity of the object claim or narrative.

cluster_relations.rel_desc: Historical figures can provide a factual basis that supports the authenticity of some urban legends.
cluster_relations.canonical_rel_desc: Indicates that the subject serves as factual or evidential support for the credibility or authenticity of the object claim or narrative.

args.canonical_rel_desc: Indicates that the subject affects, shapes, or constrains how the truth or credibility of the object is judged or interpreted.
args.justification: This relation concerns how the perceived authenticity of urban legends affects judgments about the truth behind the stories, which is an epistemic (assessment/interpretation) influence rather than a direct causal process. Updating the description, relation class, and class group makes it consistent with the evidential/epistemic nature of the second and third relations while keeping a distinct predicate from explicit evidential support.

executed_decisions.canonical_rel_desc: Indicates that the subject affects, shapes, or constrains how the truth or credibility of the object is judged or interpreted.
executed_decisions.justification: This relation concerns how the perceived authenticity of urban legends affects judgments about the truth behind the stories, which is an epistemic (assessment/interpretation) influence rather than a direct causal process. Updating the description, relation class, and class group makes it consistent with the evidential/epistemic nature of the second and third relations while keeping a distinct predicate from explicit evidential support.
